summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3466 for the improvement of Othello Street, from Rainier Avenue to 44th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42955 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
